text: la ahd 'ahsan qawlana miman daea 'iilaa tawhid allah webadth wahdah waeamil salhana wqal: 'iinani min almuslimin almnqadyn li'amr allah wshreh. wafi alayat hatha ealaa aldaewat 'iilaa allah sbhanh, wbyan fadal aleulama' aldaeyn 'iilayh ealaa bsyrt, wafq ma ja' ean rasul allah muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
